```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(psych)
library(mice)
library(FactoMineR)
```

```{r}

women <- read_sav("datasets/wm.sav") |> 
  arrange(HH1, HH2) |> 
  mutate(across(FN3A:FN4NR, 
                ~case_when(
                  . == "?" ~ 0,
                  . == "" ~ 0,
                  is.na(.) ~ as.numeric(NA),
                  TRUE ~ 1
                ) |> as.numeric()
  )) |> 
  select(-c(FN3NR,FN4NR))
    
household <- read_sav("datasets/hh.sav") |> 
  select(HH1, HH2, `ST2$1`:`ST3$4` , HC19) |> 
  arrange(HH1, HH2)
  

#skimr::skim(women)
#skimr::skim(household)

```

```{r}
mics <- left_join(women, household, by = c("HH1","HH2")) |> 
  select(
    starts_with(c("FN","LS","MT")), WAGE, stratum, PSU, wmweight, ethnicity, insurance, welevel, zone, MSTATUS, HH6, MA6, WB18, VT20:VT22X
  )
```

```{r}
write_csv(mics, "datasets/mics.csv")
```
